LanguageData.AncientEmergencyLight_Blue.label: ancient light
LanguageData.AncientEmergencyLight_Blue.description: An ancient light containing a long-lasting battery.
LanguageData.AncientEmergencyLight_Green.label: mechanoid light
LanguageData.AncientEmergencyLight_Green.description: A light used in mechanoid facilities. The green hue is optimal for mechanoid optical arrays.
LanguageData.AncientEmergencyLight_Red.label: ancient emergency light
LanguageData.AncientEmergencyLight_Red.description: An ancient light containing a long-lasting battery.
LanguageData.AncientHeatVent.label: ancient heat vent
LanguageData.AncientHeatVent.description: A massive duct that drops endlessly into the ground. It will regularly vent heat from an underground megastructure, dramatically raising the temperature of the surrounding area.
LanguageData.AncientSmokeVent.label: ancient smoke vent
LanguageData.AncientSmokeVent.description: The exhaust vent of some long forgotten underground megastructure. It periodically vents a large amount of smoke, blocking the sun for days at a time.
LanguageData.AncientToxVent.label: ancient toxic vent
LanguageData.AncientToxVent.description: A massive duct that vents toxic fumes from an underground megastructure. It will regularly cause toxic fallout in the area.
LanguageData.BurrowWall.label: burrow wall
LanguageData.BurrowWall.description: A compact mix of dirt, rock, and insect secretion.
LanguageData.GeothermalVent.label: sulfur spout
LanguageData.GeothermalVent.description: A naturally-occurring break in the ground from which volcanic gases escape. These vents bring nutrients to the surface from deep underground. Collectively, the fumes they spew are enough to block out the sun.
LanguageData.InsectLairEntrance.label: cave entrance
LanguageData.InsectLairEntrance.description: The entrance to a cave network. It is possible to climb down into the caves below.
LanguageData.InsectLairEntrance.comps.CompSealable.co: Collapsing the cave entrance is permanent. Anything or anyone left below will be lost forever.{0}\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.InsectLairEntrance.comps.CompSealable.se: Choose a colonist to permanently collapse the entrance. Anything or anyone left below will be lost forever.
LanguageData.LifeSupportUnit.label: life support unit
LanguageData.LifeSupportUnit.description: A unit connected to the orbital platform's larger life support network. It keeps rooms heated and pressurized.
LanguageData.MineableObsidian.label: obsidian
LanguageData.MineableObsidian.description: Volcanic rock formed by rapidly cooling lava. It can be mined for obsidian glass.
